metadata.synopsis: Main dialogue for the Dribbles the Clown, who in reality is a disguised doppelganger serving the Bhaalists. The player may trigger it by using stealth and approaching the stage from behind.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug book > Act 3 > Wyrm's Crossing > Circus of the Last Days. Go to the back of the circus to Dribbles' stage and sneak up on him and speak to him.

0.speaker: GROUP_ACT3_WYR_Circus_RealClown
0.text: Wa-hey! Such an eager fan. Take a seat at the front, why don't you? The show is about to start!
